section:
C."MANDATORY PRODUCTS" shall mean the following ADAMS GOLF PRODUCTS that CONSULTANT must exclusively play/use in all Champions/Senior Professional Golf Association (SPGA) and Professional Golf Association (PGA) events at all times. However, ADAMS GOLF acknowledges that from time to time, CONSULTANT may, at his discretion, utilize products from other manufacturers if ADAMS GOLF's products are deemed unsuitable or unavailable for a specific tournament or event.
[***** ] Confidential Material redacted and filed separately with the Commission. 2 1.[*****] 2.Sufficient [*****] to maintain total minimum of [*****] ADAMS GOLF [*****] (includes [*****])[*****] at all times 3.[*****] 4.[*****] (CONSULTANT may continue to place the [*****] logo on the [*****] consistent with historical practice.)
explanation: There is a contradiction between the requirement for the consultant to exclusively use Mandatory Products and the stated allowance for the consultant to use products from other manufacturers. If the products are 'mandatory' then there should be no room for other manufacturers products.

section: 8. MINIMUM NUMBER OF TOURNAMENTS AND POTENTIAL REPAYMENT OF BASE COMPENSATION A. In each and every calendar year of this Agreement, CONSULTANT shall endeavor to achieve a satisfactory record of play in a minimum of [* ****] professional golf association events on the SPGA and/or PGA tour (which shall include both the PGA and SPGA Tour Skins Games). If for any reason, CONSULTANT should achieve a satisfactory record of play in less than [*****] SPGA and/or PGA tour events in a calendar year, he *may*, at ADAMS GOLF's sole discretion, be required to repay ADAMS GOLF an amount per event for each event under [*****] achieved in the given calendar year as follows: The agreed upon repayment amount per event per calendar year: 1. Year 1. $[*****] 2. Year 2 $[*****] 3. Year 3 $[*****] 4. Year 4 $[*****] 5. Year 5 $[*****] B. If repayment is deemed necessary by ADAMS GOLF, payment shall be made to ADAMS GOLF within one month following notification of the required repayment.
explanation: This section has conflicting language, saying that the consultant 'shall endeavor' to play in a minimum number of events, but then states that he '*may*, at ADAMS GOLF's sole discretion, be required to repay ADAMS GOLF an amount per event.' This indicates that the consultant is not actually required to play in a minimum number of events, but instead, is only 'endeavoring' to play in that number.

section: 18. BASE COMPENSATION For the entire term of this Agreement, from September 1, 2004 through [*****] ADAMS GOLF *intends* to pay CONSULTANT a base compensation of [*****] dollars. Payment of the base compensation will be subject to ADAMS GOLF's financial performance and continued evaluation of CONSULTANT's brand value.
explanation: Here, Adams Golf states that it '*intends* to pay' the consultant a base compensation, but states that 'payment of the base compensation will be subject to ADAMS GOLF's financial performance and continued evaluation of CONSULTANT's brand value.' There is a discrepancy in these statements, because the word 'intends' is not binding.
